title: Surge Arrester
description: Maintenance activities for Surge Arrester in HV SWGR system

body.raw:
# Surge Arrester


## Leakage

- Leakage Current
- Monitoring


## Counter

- Counter Check
- Operation Count


## Insulation

- Ins. Resist.
- Ground Connection
